content: **knitted cloth in drops paris the piece is worked bottom up with relief-pattern theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #lighttouchcloths drops design pattern w-942 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 26 x 22 cm **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 17 off white / 26 beige / 67 wheat / 68 almond 1 cloth weighs approx 46 g **needles** drops single pointed needles size 4 5 mm **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 24 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
